com.atakmap.android.user.geocode

Class GeocodeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.user.geocode.GeocodeManager

  • public class GeocodeManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Ability to register a variety of types of Geocoding capabilities via a plugin architecture. Users must implement the Geocode Interface in order to be used.

    • Nested Class Summary
